text:
League 1
ASSE: the Greens extend a nugget of the training center
The young Bilal Benkhedim has just extended his contract with his training club until 2022. A good shot from the Greens who extend a nugget from their training center.
05 Nov 2019, 17:20 by Antoine Chirat



Harold MoukoudiClub previous: Le HavreTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Jean-Eudes Aholou Previous club: AS MonacoTransfer fee: none (ready) Icon Sport



Alpha SissokoClub previous: ClermontTransfer allowance: noneIcon Sport



Yohan CabayeClub previous: without clubTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Sergi PalenciaClub previous: FC BarcelonaTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Miguel TraucoClub previous: FlamengoTransfer allowance: 1 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Denis BouangaClub previous: N√Æmes OlympiqueTransfer fee: ‚Ç¨ 4.5 M Icon Sport



Ryad BoudebouzClub previous: Betis SevillaTransfer allowance: 3.5 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Zaydou Youssouf Previous club: Girondins de BordeauxTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport

ASSE: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019

With the arrival of Claude Puel, young people, including the training center are gradually taking power. If we knew very well William Saliba, we discovered in recent weeks his accomplice in defense Wesley Fofana, but also the midfielder came from Bordeaux Zaydou Youssouf. Still in this perspective, the leaders have just extended another hope until 2022: the young Bilal Benkhedim.




"Continue to progress"




Bilal Benkhedim + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"I am very happy to extend with my training club My first goal is to continue to progress daily to evolve, one day, in the elite.I thank the club for its confidence and will redouble efforts to continue at best my job. " explained the youngster when signing his new contract that binds him with the Greens until 2022.
